sentences.en: Economic forecasting, that art of the impossible, is more aptly called nowcasting.
sentences.cn: 经济预测是一项“不可能的艺术”, 叫做“现测”或许更恰当.

sentences.en: To better forecast landslide and debris flow, we localized mesoscale model, the well-known MM5, and the nowcasting technique of satellite and radar also were utilized.
sentences.cn: 针对滑坡、泥石流，应用MM5中尺度预报模式进行本地化，并结合卫星和雷达的客观雨量预报方法。

sentences.en: VWP as the wind data for computing helicity is feasible and is more suitable for nowcasting work compared with other wind data.
sentences.cn: 利用VWP风场产品来作为计算螺旋度的风场资料是可行的，比起其它风场资料更适于短时（临近）预报的业务化工作。
